Folder.name: MES_Restore
Folder.description: Folder for MES Reports to an restored database

Report.name: Production by Entity
Report.description: Provides information about produced data for a selected entities for a given period

Report.name: OEE by Shift Trend
Report.description: Provides information about produced data for a selected entities for a given period

Report.name: Genealogy by Work Order
Report.description: Provides information about produced data for a selected entities for a given period

Report.name: Downtime Analysis
Report.description: Provides information about produced data for a selected entities for a given period

Report.name: Production Event Summary by Utilization Reason Group
Report.file: Production Event Summary by Utilization Reason Group_Restore.rdl
Report.description: Production Event Summary by Utilization Reason Group

Report.name: _EventDetails
Report.description: Internal report. Lists PAs and EPAs for a specific EventGlobId

Report.name: Events Report
Report.description: Table of events filtered on PAs

Report.name: Genealogy Report
Report.description: Provides Genealogy and ReverseGenealogy for events filtered on PAs

Report.name: _Genealogy Detail Report
Report.description: Internal report. Provide Genealogy Data for a single production attribute.

Report.name: _Genealogy Expanded Report
Report.description: Internal report. Provide Genealogy Data for multiple production attributes.

Report.name: Production Report
Report.description: Provides information about produced events filtered and grouped by user configurable criteria
